snippet.title: Secrets by Episode | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Explore a world of sweet and spicy romance. You're the main character in these interactive stories, and your choices shape how each chapter unfolds.

Play Secrets by Episode on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81664645

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 300 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Secrets by Episode | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

Explore a world of sweet and spicy romance. You're the main character in these interactive stories, and your choices shape how each chapter unfolds.
